experience.brief: As a Frontend Developer at Spondon It, I am responsible for building and maintaining responsive, user-friendly web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks, HTML, and CSS. I collaborate closely with designers and backend developers to ensure seamless integration and functionality of web applications.

During my tenure as a Quality Assurance Tester at MightyTech, I was responsible for ensuring the quality and functionality of software products. I collaborated with developers to identify and resolve bugs, conducted manual and automated testing, and contributed to creating efficient testing strategies and documentation.

education.brief: Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Engineering, focusing on software development and data science.
Completed a diploma program in Civil Engineering with practical experience in construction and project management.
Achieved a strong foundation in science subjects, excelling in mathematics and physics.
